trash-single: Your message was moved to trash!
trash-bulk: Your messages were moved to trash!
recipients-not-valid: One or more of the recipients are not valid emails
subject: Subject
encryption-error-label-tooltip: This message had an encryption error.
not-signed-label-tooltip: The sender could not be verified.
signed-label-tooltip: You are communicating with the real sender.
mixnet-label-tooltip: This message was sent using panoramix mixnet.
feedback-placeholder: Tell us what you liked, didn't like, what is missing and generally what you think about Pixelated.

login.title: Oh, something went wrong :(
login.message: Try to login again in a few minutes. If the problem persists, contact your account administrator.

admin-form.title: Contact your account administrator and ask for their part of the recovery code
admin-form.tip1: The safest way to do this is in person.
admin-form.tip2: You can call or text if you need to.
admin-form.tip3: Don't ever ask for it via email.

user-form.title: Remember your backup account?
user-form.description: When you created your account you received a message - it was sent by team@pixelated-project.org. You'll need the recovery code that is in it.

error.invalid-password: A better password has at least 8 characters

backup-account-step.title: Wait! What if you forget your password again?

backup-email.title: What if you forget your password?
backup-email.paragraph1: You will need a backup account. Choose an alternative email address you use regularly.
backup-email.paragraph2: Instructions to recover your password will be sent to this email address, save it.

error.invalid-email: Please enter a valid email address

confirmation.title2: A message was sent to your backup account
confirmation.paragraph: Save this message, it is really important.

error.submit-error: There was an error. Please try again later.

footer-text: Product in development. Feedback and issues to

login.welcome-message: Pixelated is an email that respects the privacy of your information.
